sql:
SELECT
	mentain_req_stn.reqID,
	regions.REGION,
	mentain_req_stn.vehNo,
	mentain_req_stn.servicetype,
	mentain_req_stn.description,
	mentain_req_stn.KMR,
	mentain_req_stn.requestedby,
	mentain_req_stn.requestedon,
	mentain_req_stn.status,
	mentain_req_stn.Station,
	stations.REGION_ID
FROM
	mentain_req_stn
	LEFT OUTER JOIN stations ON stations.STATION = mentain_req_stn.Station
	INNER JOIN regions ON regions.REGION_ID = stations.REGION_ID
ORDER BY
	mentain_req_stn.reqID DESC
name: mentain_req_stn
